title: TextView One parameter
content: .myTextView .name { overflow: hidden ;margin-left: 10px; background-color: #a9b3bc; color: black; font-weight: bolder; display: inline-block; margin-top: 5px;text-align: center;}
.myTextView .value { overflow: hidden; margin-left: 10px; background-color: black; color: #00ff00; font-weight: bold; display: inline-block; text-align: left; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 5px; }
